title: Threads from Instagram
description: Threads is a fast and easy way to stay up-to-date with your Instagram friends. Chat With Instagram Friends on Threads - Message and video chat with people on Instagram, even if they’re not on Threads. See Who's Available - Check to see when your friends are active and available to chat. Set a Status to Share What You're Up To - Create a status with text and emoji that will appear next to your profile picture. Automatically Update Your Status - Turn on Auto Status to easily update your status based on your location and other signals. Pin People to See Their Updates First - See the people you care about the most as soon as you open Threads. Choose Your Own Theme - Pick the color of your app and icon on your phone.
descriptionHTML:
Threads is a fast and easy way to stay up-to-date with your Instagram friends.

Chat With Instagram Friends on Threads
- Message and video chat with people on Instagram, even if they’re not on Threads.

See Who's Available
- Check to see when your friends are active and available to chat.

Set a Status to Share What You're Up To
- Create a status with text and emoji that will appear next to your profile picture.

Automatically Update Your Status
- Turn on Auto Status to easily update your status based on your location and other signals.

Pin People to See Their Updates First
- See the people you care about the most as soon as you open Threads.

Choose Your Own Theme
- Pick the color of your app and icon on your phone.
